generated_body: The article titled "LASIK eye surgery should be taken off market, ex-FDA adviser says" is likely to discuss concerns raised by a former FDA adviser regarding the safety and efficacy of LASIK eye surgery. Readers may expect an exploration of potential risks associated with the procedure, including complications and long-term effects on vision. The piece could also provide insights into regulatory perspectives and whether existing guidelines sufficiently protect patients. Additionally, it may highlight any ongoing debates within the medical community about the future of LASIK and alternative vision correction options.
